paragraph.paragraph: This section of the documentation outlines the structure of EiffelEnvision projects and their presence in the url*Solution Explorer.

project.xml EiffelEnvision Project Structure
An overview of an EiffelEnvision project structure and why projects are structured the way they are.

references/index.xml Project References
Detailed infomration on the References folder in EiffelEnvision projects.

project_items/index.xml EiffelEnvision Project Structure
Detailed infomration on the Project Items folder in EiffelEnvision projects.

eiffel_libraries/index.xml Eiffel Libraries
Detailed infomration on the Eiffel Libraries folder in EiffelEnvision projects.

other_project_items/index.xml Other Project Items
Detailed infomration on the Other Project Items folder in EiffelEnvision projects.

known_folders.xml Known EiffelEnvision Folders
Infomation on the physical folders used by EiffelEnvision projects.
